meanings.definition: A document issued by an employer to an employee showing the amount earned and deductions taken for a specific pay period.
meanings.sent1: I always keep my paystubs in a folder for safekeeping.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to review your paystubs to ensure accuracy in your earnings.
meanings.sent3: When I accidentally spilled coffee on my paystubs, they turned into a soggy mess.
meanings.sent4: Her stack of paystubs was like a paper trail of her hard work throughout the month.
meanings.sent5: The paystubs fluttered in the wind, revealing the story of each employee's labor.
